lexUnit.name: head.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs.

sentence.text: And it was a little later that same night that his lordship said with some gravity , shaking his head : ` I fought that war to preserve justice in this world .
Blazer put down his head and nuzzled at her coat pocket .
Alerted by a slight sound , she again opened her eyes , turning her head slowly to see a cup and saucer being placed on a nearby small table .
` A lady of light weight may ride to the top of Skiddaw without alighting , and descend it to the town in safety , if in the steepest parts someone manages her horses head .
This fish has a rather expanded , frog-like head behind which there are prominent fins ; a slender body , which is flexible , supported by a host of tiny ribs , which are clearly visible .
I rested my head on the glass , and up went a pigeon .
Seemingly familiar with the routine , she cradled my head in her arms in a practised manner and stood waiting .
He jerked his head at a hollow twenty yards behind him .
The chosen person stands with her back to the rest and throws the ball over her head without looking to see where it lands .

Burun turned his head without interrupting what Jotan was saying to him , and intercepting the look Alexei left Jehana 's side and went unobtrusively into the line of Merkuts to the side of a grizzled warrant officer .
However , when she raised her head to look at him once more he hesitated , giving a preoccupied shake of his head before beginning to pace up and down the carpet in front of her .
She indicated Chris with a quick nod of the head , and ran up the garden to the house .
Nervous or aggressive horses will adopt a tense carriage with a high head and neck .
He had a large head and a round red face and while he repeated ` What a wet night !
ANOTHER had his head submerged in a kitchen sink by a nurse who was ` testing his breaking point . "
He was hustled up to London to have his head cut off with less mercy than we would treat a chicken .
